column5: Hi all havent been around in a while been very busy with my new love dont all shout at once Golf!  Any way the first round of Britains got talent started last night and this kid pops up take a look unfortunately there is about 1 min of adverts to watch but... well worth the wait.  Andrew is his name 13 year old kid bullied at school because he likes singing sounds familiar I know but it works.  http://talent.itv.com/videos/viewvideo/16460730  Regards Clive

Hey Clive good to see you are back .  You are due to send us a Carp report with pics.  Was thinking of you the other day as I watched a Carp fishing tournament on WFN from the UK winner took 25 000 pounds.  What impressed me was all those rod extentions to reach the fish.  Hope to see some fish  pics soon if not send us some Golf pics  MTP
WOW... that kid is good!  G

English, I know the Webber piece well, and I knew that octave jump was coming up towards the middle of the selection, and was thinking that he'd never make it.  He nailed it, pure and true.  Our Charlotte did a similar thing a few years ago, I think.  Thanks for sharing that.  I loved the Paul Potts story too.

I hope you do not mind.. I am posting the video to this thread, minus the commercials  <object width="425" height="355"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LExJ6oN4hUo&hl=en"></param><param'>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LExJ6oN4hUo&hl=en"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LExJ6oN4hUo&hl=en" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="355"></embed></object>  This kid is something and has real talent.  G
Thanks guys much better without the ads  Regards Clive

Lily Allen is very unique in her style.
